name: Loyal Marines
author: guitarninja#5707
background: The Loyal Marines are an arm of the Imperium's military, one of the best-equipped and best trained. They are genetically engineered for battle and created for the sole purpose of destroying the enemies of the Imperium.
strengths: The Loyal Marines have the tools for just about every situation, and can take on many types of foes. They are as flexible as you need them to be.
weaknesses: Loyal Marines tend to be quite tough and highly trained and as such, their units are often quite expensive and may find it difficult to field models to cover a large battlefield.

arch_marine_tactics.name: Arch-Marine of Tactics
arch_marine_tactics.description: One of the original founders of the loyal marines and an extremely powerful leader.

grav_captin.name: Prime Captain (Grav Armor)
grav_captin.description: A fearless next-generation leader in heavy Grav armor.

prime_infiltration_captain.name: Prime Infiltration Captain
prime_infiltration_captain.description: A fearless next-generation leader in stealth armor.

prime_champion_on_bike.name: Prime Champion on Bike
prime_champion_on_bike.description: A fearless next-generation combat master on a bike.

prime_surgeon.name: Prime Surgeon
prime_surgeon.description: A fearless next-generation surgeon trained in saving lives.

loyal_marines.name: Loyal Marines
loyal_marines.description: Elite trained marines sworn to protect the Empire.

loyal_marines_angels.name: Loyal Marines
loyal_marines_angels.description: Elite trained marines sworn to protect the Empire.

scout_marines.name: Scout Marines
scout_marines.description: Elite trained marines sworn to protect the Empire.

veteran_marines.name: Veteran Marines
veteran_marines.description: Veteran marines with a variety of special weapons.

prime_marines.name: Prime Marine Squad
prime_marines.description: Elite trained marines of a new breed.

prime_elimination_squad.name: Prime Elimination Squad
prime_elimination_squad.description: Elite trained marines with long ranged sniper weaponry.

prime_assault_squad.name: Prime Assault Marines
prime_assault_squad.description: Elite trained marines of a new breed.

honor_guard.name: Honor Guard
honor_guard.description: Marines clad in golden armor and wings with dangerous melee weapons.

werewolves.name: Werewolves
werewolves.description: Marines that are half marine and half werewolf.

prime_reaper_squad.name: Prime Reaper Squad
prime_reaper_squad.description: Elite trained marines of a new breed specialized in fear and close fighting.

prime_infiltration_squad.name: Prime Infiltration Squad
prime_infiltration_squad.description: Elite trained marines of a new breed specialized in infiltration and stealth tactics.

prime_guard_squad.name: Prime Blade Guardians
prime_guard_squad.description: Heavily armored elite trained marines of a new breed eqiupped with combat shields to protect them in close combat.

prime_eradicators.name: Prime Eradication Squad
prime_eradicators.description: Heavily armored marines with deadly anti-tank weaponry.

prime_blasters.name: Prime Blaster Squad
prime_blasters.description: Heavily armored marines with deadly anti-tank weaponry.

prime_interception_squad.name: Prime Interception Squad
prime_interception_squad.description: Heavily armored marines with carbines and jetpacks.

prime_suppression_squad.name: Prime Suppression Squad
prime_suppression_squad.description: Heavily armored marines with carbines and jetpacks.

prime_aggression_squad.name: Prime Aggression Squad
prime_aggression_squad.description: Heavily armored marines with carbines and jetpacks.

centurion_squad.name: Centurion Exosuit Squad
centurion_squad.description: Marines armed and armored like walking tanks.

prime_rider_squad.name: Prime Rider Squad
prime_rider_squad.description: Upgraded and highly trained bikers armed to the teeth.

assault_squad.name: Assault Squad
assault_squad.description: A squad of elite marines trained to fight in close combat.

furious_assault_squad.name: Furious Marines
furious_assault_squad.description: A squad of especially angry assault marines.

veteran_assault_squad.name: Veteran Assault Squad
veteran_assault_squad.description: A squad of veteran marines trained to fight in close combat.

destoyers.name: Destroyers
destoyers.description: Marines clad in very heavy armor and highly trained.

devastators.name: Devastators
devastators.description: A squad of highly trained marines armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

marine_apc.name: APC
marine_apc.description: A durable transport built by the loyal marines.

drop_pod.name: Drop Pod
drop_pod.description: A durable transport built by the loyal marines.

marine_assault_apc.name: Assault APC
marine_assault_apc.description: A durable transport built by the loyal marines with upgraded weaponry.

marine_artillery_vehicle.name: Artillery Vehicle
marine_artillery_vehicle.description: An armored artillery vehicle helmed by loyal marines.

marine_battle_tank.name: Battle Tank
marine_battle_tank.description: An armored tank helmed by loyal marines.

marine_heavy_tank.name: Heavy Assault APC
marine_heavy_tank.description: A heavily armored transport sporting an arsenal of weapons built by the loyal marines.

hover_apc.name: Prime Hover APC
hover_apc.description: A durable transport with hover technology.

heavy_hover_apc.name: Prime Heavy Hover APC
heavy_hover_apc.description: A heavy transport with hover technology and loaded out with many weapons.

prime_battle_tank.name: Prime Hover Battle Tank
prime_battle_tank.description: A heavy transport with hover technology and a large anti-tank weapon.

heavy_hover_tank.name: Prime Heavy Hover Tank
heavy_hover_tank.description: A heavy transport with hover technology and a large anti-tank weapon.

prime_light_walker.name: Prime Light Walker
prime_light_walker.description: A lightly equipped prime recon walker.

prime_assault_walker.name: Prime Assault Walker
prime_assault_walker.description: A heavily armed prime combat walker.

furious_assault_walker.name: Furious Assault Walker
furious_assault_walker.description: A heavily armed combat walker kitted for melee destruction.

veteran_assault_walker.name: Veteran Assault Walker
veteran_assault_walker.description: An elite and heavily armed combat walker.

psychic_assault_walker.name: Psychic Assault Walker
psychic_assault_walker.description: A heavily armed combat walker with psychic powers.

contemptor_assault_walker.name: Contemptor Assault Walker
contemptor_assault_walker.description: A heavily armed ancient combat walker.

raven_gunship.name: Raven Gunship
raven_gunship.description: A heavy transport and fire support gunship.

psychic_grand_master.name: Psychic Grand Master
psychic_grand_master.description: A Master of psychic powers and martial combat.

psychic_ancient.name: Psychic Ancient
psychic_ancient.description: A psychic marine carrying a sacred banner.

psychic_destroyer_ancient.name: Psychic Destroyer Ancient
psychic_destroyer_ancient.description: A psychic destroyer marine carrying a sacred banner.

psychic_marine_squad.name: Psychic Marines
psychic_marine_squad.description: Marines trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

psychic_purifier_squad.name: Psychic Purifiers
psychic_purifier_squad.description: Psychic marines that are especially adept at casting powers.

purge_squad.name: Purge Marines
purge_squad.description: Marines trained to hunt demons with heavy psychic weapons.

teleport_squad.name: Teleport Squad
teleport_squad.description: Marines trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers with teleporting backpack.

psychic_destroyers.name: Psychic Destroyers
psychic_destroyers.description: Marines in heavy armor trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

psychic_paladins.name: Psychic Paladins
psychic_paladins.description: Marines in heavy armor trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

grand_master_dread_walker.name: Grand Master in Dread Walker
grand_master_dread_walker.description: A large psychic walker with heavy weapons and extreme combat prowess.

dread_walker.name: Dread Walker
dread_walker.description: A large psychic walker with heavy weapons and extreme combat prowess.

marine_siegebreaker.name: Marine Siegebreakers
marine_siegebreaker.description: Marines who excel at breaching enemy lines under heavy fire.

multi_scanner.name: Multi-Scanner
multi_scanner.description: Once per round, this unit may re-roll an Initiative test. This may be used one additional time per round for each model with this rule.

magnetic_grapple.name: Magnetic Grapple
magnetic_grapple.description: Units engaged in Melee with a model that has this weapon suffer -2 to Initiative tests when escaping combat for each weapon with this rule.

blinding_light.name: Blinding Light
blinding_light.description: Enemy models suffer -1 Strength when targeting this model with a Melee attack.

sweeping.name: Sweeping
sweeping.description: Strength rolls of 1 or 2 with this weapon cause 2 hits instead of 1.

legend_charge.name: Charge Leader
legend_charge.description: This model and friendly _Infantry_ units within 3" gain +3" Movement on any Charge actions.

legend_hammer.name: Righteousness
legend_hammer.description: On a turn where this model charges, all Melee attacks gain +1 AP.

walker_transport.name: Walker Transport
walker_transport.description: This model may carry X _Walker_ models inside of it.

hunter_team.name: Hunter Team
hunter_team.description: At the start of the game, choose a unit category. Accuracy and Strength rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP against units in that category.

arch_tactics.name: Arch-Marine Tactics
arch_tactics.description:
When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6" to receive one of the following bonuses until the end of the round: 
 * Re-roll all failed Accuracy tests 
 * Re-roll all failed Strength tests 
 * Re-roll all failed Initiative tests

rifle_tactics.name: Marine Ranged Tactics
rifle_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

dread_walker_tactics.name: Dread Walker Tactics
dread_walker_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ or _Dread Walker_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

melee_tactics.name: Melee Tactics
melee_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

melee_tactics_bike.name: Biker Melee Tactics
melee_tactics_bike.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ or _Biker_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

expert_marksman.name: Expert Marksman
expert_marksman.description: This model and friendly _Infantry_ units within 3" gain +1 to hit with shooting attacks.

grappling_hooks.name: Grappling Hooks
grappling_hooks.description: This model may ignore vertical movement distances when moving.

combat_shield.name: Combat Shield
combat_shield.description: Whenever this model loses a wound, roll a D10. On a 3 or less that wound is not lost.

ancient_armor.name: Ancient Armor
ancient_armor.description: This model may re-roll 1 failed Save roll.

legend_remembrance.name: Armor of Remembrance
legend_remembrance.description: When this model is hit by an attack, roll a D10. On a 3 or less, that attack is prevented.

legend_shard.name: Demonic Shard
legend_shard.description: This model increases all power charge values by 1.

warding_staff.name: Warding
warding_staff.description: Enemy units suffer -1 to all Power(x) test while within 12" of this model.

hidden_relics.flavor: Ancient armour said to protect the wearer from significant harm.
A chainsword crafted to destroy even the toughest enemy infantry.
A trained marksman can have a very deadly effect.
A well-trained tactician in mobility warfare.
A trained fighter can dispatch even the toughest foes in deadly combat.

legend_gravity_field.name: Gravity Field
legend_gravity_field.flavor: This gravity field generator can be overcharged to bounce even the toughest attacks for a moment.

legend_remembrance.name: Armor of Remembrance
legend_remembrance.description: Upgrade one model with Armor of Remembrance.
legend_remembrance.flavor: This armor serves as a reminder to those who have fallen before them.

legend_shard.name: Demonic Shard
legend_shard.description: Upgrade one model with Demonic Shard.
legend_shard.flavor: This demonic crystal is imbued with psychic energy.

legend_staff.name: The Warding Staff
legend_staff.description: Replace one Leader model's Psychic Staff with The Warding Staff.
legend_staff.flavor: This staff has the power to absorb and stop psychic energy.

legend_righteousness.name: Righteousness
legend_righteousness.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Righteousness.
legend_righteousness.flavor: This model's purpose is pure and aim is righteous.

legend_charge.name: Charge Leader
legend_charge.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Charge Leader.
legend_charge.flavor: This model is known to be on the front line leading the first charge against the enemy.

the_black_blade.name: The Black Blade
the_black_blade.description: Replace one Leader model's Psychic Sword with The Black Blade.
the_black_blade.flavor: This blade is bound with the soul of a powerful demon, giving incredible strength.

strategies.name: Vigilance
strategies.description: Use when taking an initiative test. That unit is treated as having +2 Initiative for that test.
strategies.flavor: With countless battles experienced, these soldiers are trained to react to any situation.

strategies.name: Genetically Engineered
strategies.description: Use before taking Save rolls for an _Infantry_ or _Biker_ unit. It gets +1 Save.
strategies.flavor: With the best implants and engineering that can be found, it's easy to take a hit and keep standing.

strategies.name: Fearless
strategies.description: Use before activating a unit. That unit may immediately remove up to 2 Shock.
strategies.flavor: Marines are trained to stay strong even in the toughest fights.

strategies.name: Takedown
strategies.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit is given a Fight action. Hits rolls of 1 or 2 generate one additional hit.
strategies.flavor: Trained in deadly close combat tactics, Alien Hunters are prepared to fight.

strategies.name: Special Ammunition
strategies.description:
Use when shooting with an _Infantry_ unit. Choose a weapon name to gain one of the following for this attack: 
 * +1 AP 
 * +3" of range
strategies.flavor: Equipped with special Alien Hunting armaments, they are trained to kill.

strategies.name: Hunters
strategies.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in Ambush before the game begins. Any round after the first, when this unit is activated while in reserves, you may choose a point on the battlefield 12" away from any enemy units and take an Initiative check. If passed, place the unit at that location on the location. If failed, use D10 scattering to determine the landing location of the unit relative to the chosen point.
strategies.flavor: With countless battles experienced, these soldiers are trained to react to any situation.

strategies.name: Toughness
strategies.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit takes Save rolls. Roll a die for each hit this unit takes. On a 3 or less that hit is prevented.
strategies.flavor: These marines are particularly tough and can take a hit.

strategies.name: Durability
strategies.description: Use before activating a unit with a Damage Table. That unit is treated as having no critical damage tokens for this activation.
strategies.flavor: Some of the most well-maintained vehicles and machinery can operate under great stress.

strategies.name: Reliability
strategies.description: Use when a unit attacks. That unit may re-roll a single hit die.
strategies.flavor: With expert craftsmanship, their weapons can perform better than most.

strategies.name: Toughness
strategies.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit takes Save rolls. Roll a die for each hit this unit takes. On a 3 or less that hit is prevented.
strategies.flavor: These marines are particularly tough and can take a hit.

strategies.name: Enhancements
strategies.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit shoots. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.
strategies.flavor: With enhanced firepower, their weapons can hit with extra strength.

strategies.name: Machine Might
strategies.description: Use when a _Vehicle_ unit attacks in melee. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.
strategies.flavor: With a wave of fire, enemy units cannot hope to stand a chance.

strategies.name: Bolster
strategies.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit is targeted by an enemy. If it did not move this round, that unit may increase its cover level by 1 (none to soft, soft to hard).
strategies.flavor: A strong defensive position ensures greater survival, even against the toughest of weapons.

strategies.name: Devastation
strategies.description: Use before shooting with a unit. The target reduces its cover level by 1 (hard to soft, soft to none).
strategies.flavor: Finding and exploiting a vulnerable piece of cover can lead to devastating results.

strategies.name: Rapid Fire
strategies.description: Use before an _Infantry_ unit performs a Shoot action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 cause an additional hit.
strategies.flavor: With a wave of fire, enemy units cannot hope to stand a chance.

strategies.name: Psychic Aim
strategies.description: Use when shooting with an _Infantry_ unit. That unit may target enemies it cannot see at -1 Accuracy.
strategies.flavor: Psychic marines are trained to use their psychic vision to guide their shots.

strategies.name: Psychic Channeling
strategies.flavor: With focus and energy, even the most difficult psychic powers can be manifested.
strategies.description: Use before a unit rolls for casting a psychic power. The spell charge value is increased by 1 and the spell has +6" of range.

strategies.name: Teleporter
strategies.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in Ambush before the game begins. Any round after the first, when this unit is activated while in reserves, you may choose a point on the battlefield 12" away from any enemy units and take an Initiative check. If passed, place the unit at that location on the location. If failed, use D10 scattering to determine the landing location of the unit relative to the chosen point.
strategies.flavor: Psychic marines often arrive via a teleporter to surprise their enemies.

strategies.name: Ambush
strategies.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in Ambush before the game begins. Any round after the first, when this unit is activated while in reserves, you may choose a point on the battlefield 12" away from any enemy units and take an Initiative check. If passed, place the unit at that location on the location. If failed, use D10 scattering to determine the landing location of the unit relative to the chosen point.
strategies.flavor: With countless battles experienced, these soldiers are trained to react to any situation.

strategies.name: Concealment
strategies.flavor: Loyal marines are sometimes trained in stealth tactics allowing them to hide even in plain sight.
strategies.description: Use this strategy when a unit is targeted by an enemy Shooting attack. That unit gets -1 Accuracy this attack.

strategies.name: Stealth Assault
strategies.flavor: Striking when the enemy least expects is a good way to quietly deal with an enemy.
strategies.description: Use this strategy when an _Infantry_ unit charges. If the charging unit only makes a single move action this activation, enemy units may not react to that charge.

strategies.name: Encircle
strategies.description: Up to half of any force's units, one point for each may be placed in Encirclement reserves before the game begins. At the beginning of any round after the first, that unit may be set up within 6" of any table edge and more than 12" from any enemy units. If both players have reserves arriving on the same turn, roll off to see who places theirs first.
strategies.flavor: With speed a ferocity, these marines can outflank their enemies.

strategies.name: Moving Fire
strategies.flavor: These marines are trained to shoot while moving to maintain pressure on their enemies.
strategies.description: Use after an _Infantry_ unit makes a Move action. That unit may make a free shoot action with -1 Accuracy.

strategies.name: Ferocity
strategies.flavor: With a furious charge, these marines move into combat quickly.
strategies.description: Use this strategy when an _Infantry_ unit charges. That unit gains +3" of Movement for the charge action.

strategies.name: Ferocity
strategies.description: Use when activating a unit. That unit gets +1 Courage.
strategies.flavor: Sometimes with disregard for their own life, these marines will stop at nothing to defeat their enemies.

strategies.name: Fury
strategies.flavor: These marines are furious in resolve and can rip through their enemies.
strategies.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit makes a Fight action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP.

strategies.name: Assault
strategies.flavor: With a furious charge, these marines move into combat quickly.
strategies.description: Use this strategy when an _Infantry_ unit charges. That unit gains +3" of Movement for the charge action.

strategies.name: Tactical Retreat
strategies.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit attempts to fall back from melee. That unit automatically passes the Initiative check required to fall back.
strategies.flavor: A quick tactical retreat and a burst of fire can cause an enemy a lot of problems.

strategies.name: Courageous
strategies.description: Use when activating a unit. That unit gets +1 Courage.
strategies.flavor: These marines are some of the most courageous ever seen, fighting to the bitter end.

strategies.name: Re-organize
strategies.description: Use at any point during an _Infantry_ unit's activation. That unit may split into two separate units or merge with another unit of the same data-sheet. This may not exceed the maximum unit size or go below the unit's minimum size.
strategies.flavor: With a wave of fire, enemy units cannot hope to stand a chance.

strategies.name: Zealous Assault
strategies.description: Use this strategy when an _Infantry_ unit charges. That unit gains +3" of Movement for the charge action.
strategies.flavor: With righteous fury, these marines charge into battle.

strategies.name: Strike Down
strategies.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit performs a Fight action. Hit rolls of 1 or 2 cause an additional hit.
strategies.flavor: These marines strike their foes down with a flurry of melee attacks.

strategies.name: Psychic Shield
strategies.description: Use when a Power(x) test is taken within 24" of an _Infantry_ unit. Roll a D10. If the value is less than or equal to the test to cast the power, it is prevented.
strategies.flavor: Shielded by holy energy, the Inquisition can protect themselves from psychic powers.

fortify.name: Courage
fortify.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gets +1 Courage until the of the round.

magic_shield.name: Shield
magic_shield.description: Target friendly unit within 12". Until the end of the round, roll a D10 each time that unit is hit. On a 2 or less, that hit is ignored.

clouded.name: Clouded
clouded.description: Target enemy unit within 18" gets -1 Accuracy until the end of the round.

pacify.name: Pacify
pacify.description: Target enemy unit within 18" suffers -1 Strength with its next attack.

storm.name: Storm
storm.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 5 hits with AP 1.

bolt.name: Bolt
bolt.description: Target enemy unit within 18" takes 2 hits with AP 5.

snare.name: Snare
snare.description: Target enemy unit within 18" gets -2" of Movement until the end of the round.

warp.name: Warp
warp.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may move up to 24" ignoring all models and terrain. This must end outside of 12" of any enemy units.

doom.name: Doom
doom.description: Target enemy model within 12" takes 1 automatic hit with AP(7).

purge.name: Purge
purge.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 8 automatic hits with AP 0.
